hero.intro: Hi, I'm Behnam Dakermanji from Canada

about.title: About Me
description: Hello! I'm Behnam Dakermanji, a passionate web developer with a unique journey. Originally from Syria, I migrated to Canada in 2019 due to the war. While I was a medical doctor in Syria, my true passion has always been programming. I began my coding journey with online courses on platforms like Udemy and edX, and have since earned three diplomas in web programming from Concordia University.

My professional experience includes working as an IT consultant for a driving school in Montreal and currently as a game tester with Keywords Studios. In the evenings, I channel my creativity and skills into freelancing projects. I love solving complex problems and creating seamless user experiences. Let's build something amazing together!

experience.role_company: IT Consultant for Ecole De Conduite Expertise

skills.name: HTML/CSS
skills.description: Proficiency in HTML5 and CSS3, with expertise in structuring and styling web pages to create visually appealing and user-friendly designs.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: Proficient in JavaScript, including modern frameworks and libraries such as React, Angular, Vue.js, and Express. Experienced in using JavaScript templates like EJS to create dynamic and responsive web applications.

skills.name: Backend Development
skills.description: Proficient in server-side languages including Node.js, with familiarity in PHP, Java, and Python. Experienced in building robust and scalable backend systems.

skills.name: Database Management
skills.description: Experienced with databases such as MySQL, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL, ensuring efficient data storage and retrieval.

skills.name: Responsive Design
skills.description: Skilled in creating responsive designs that adapt seamlessly to various devices and screen sizes, enhancing user experience.

skills.name: Version Control
skills.description: Proficient in using Git for version control, with experience on platforms like GitHub and Bitbucket for collaborative development.

skills.name: APIs
skills.description: Knowledgeable in integrating third-party services using RESTful and SOAP APIs, ensuring smooth and efficient data exchange.

skills.name: Testing & Debugging
skills.description: Adept at using tools like Chrome DevTools for thorough testing and debugging, ensuring high-quality and bug-free applications.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.description: Proficient in creating and managing spreadsheets for data analysis and reporting, utilizing advanced Excel functions and features.

detailed.title: API Integration & Development
detailed.description: I specialize in developing and integrating APIs that allow your applications to communicate seamlessly with other services. Whether you need custom APIs or third-party integration, I ensure smooth and reliable data exchange.

detailed.title: Database Management
detailed.description: I offer efficient, secure database management solutions, ensuring your data is well-organized, easily accessible, and protected. Services include database design, optimization, and ongoing maintenance to support your operational needs.

detailed.title: Backend Development
detailed.description: I design and implement robust, scalable backend systems that ensure smooth, efficient operations for your applications. My expertise includes developing APIs, managing databases, and creating server-side logic to meet diverse business requirements.
